item.title: Elasticsearch Combined Cluster Autoscaling
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Autoscaling the Compute Resource of an Elasticsearch Combined Cluster This guide will show you how to use KubeDB to autoscale compute resources i.e. cpu and memory of an Elasticsearch combined cluster. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
